units.title: Introduce iTracer construct into iPSCs
units.text: This iTracer construct is introduced by electroporation into iPSCs that contain a doxycycline‑inducible Cas9 cassette (iCRISPR)29,30.
units.rationale: Electroporation delivers the lineage recorder into cells equipped for inducible genome editing.

units.title: Initiate organoids from barcoded iPSCs
units.text: From these uniquely barcoded iPSCs, we initiate cerebral organoids using approximately 2,000 cells to record lineages during organoid development (Fig. 1b).
units.rationale: Starting organoids with a defined number of barcoded cells enables lineage tracking from the outset.

units.title: Induce scarring via doxycycline
units.text: Scarring is induced at different time points of organoid development through doxycycline induction of Cas9.
units.rationale: Temporal control of Cas9 activity creates genetic scars that serve as lineage marks.

units.title: Establish dual‑channel iTracer recorder
units.text: We established a dual‑channel lineage recorder called iTracer by coupling a complex barcode library together with an inducible Cas9 scarring system.
units.rationale: Combining barcodes and inducible scars provides two independent lineage readouts.

units.title: Perform long‑term light‑sheet imaging
units.text: Long‑term live imaging of developing cerebral organoids using an inverted light‑sheet microscope.
units.rationale: 4D light‑sheet microscopy captures high‑resolution spatiotemporal dynamics of organoid development.

units.title: Embed organoids in Matrigel for imaging
units.text: Organoids were embedded in Matrigel in the imaging chamber and cultured in neural‑induction medium.
units.rationale: Embedding stabilizes organoids for prolonged imaging while maintaining differentiation conditions.

units.title: Prepare tissue sections for spatial transcriptomics
units.text: Tissue sections were adhered to a slide with 6.5 × 6.5‑mm capture areas, permeabilized, and mRNA captured for spatial transcriptomics.
units.rationale: This workflow links spatial location to transcriptomic profiles for lineage mapping.

units.title: Microdissect regions and conduct scRNA‑seq
units.text: One 200‑µm section was cut before selecting two spatially distant regions for microdissection. Single cells were isolated from microdissected regions and processed for scRNA‑seq separately.
units.rationale: Targeted microdissection enables deep sampling of distinct spatial clones.

units.title: Optimize doxycycline concentration for scarring
units.text: We found scar‑ring was most efficient when samples were incubated with 8 µg ml⁻¹ doxycycline for 24 h and applied these conditions in all subsequent experiments.
units.rationale: Defining optimal doxycycline dose ensures consistent scar induction across experiments.

units.title: Assess barcode diversity by scRNA‑seq
units.text: We measured barcode diversity using scRNA‑seq data from three iTracer iPSC pools and found approximately 60,000 unique sequences (Methods).
units.rationale: Quantifying barcode diversity validates the complexity of the lineage‑recording library.
